quotes.quote: I don't do drugs, I am drugs.

quotes.quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.

quotes.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.

quotes.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.

quotes.quote: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.

quotes.quote: It's simple, if it jiggles, it's fat.

quotes.quote: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.

quotes.quote: One of the great things about books is sometimes there are some fantastic pictures.

quotes.quote: I never forget a face, but in your case I'll be glad to make an exception.

quotes.quote: Do, or do not. There is no 'try'.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill
